p: The study was approved by the Human Research Ethics Committee of the Federal University of Grand Dourados (UFGD-protocol numbers 003/2011 and 1.481.062/2016) and was registered at the Brazilian Ethical Office (Plataforma Brasil: http://plataformabrasil.saude.gov.br/visao/pesquisador/gerirPesquisa/gerirPesquisaAgrupador.jsf), and was conducted in accordance with all relevant tenets of the World Medical Associationâ€™s Declaration of Helsinki. All participants provided written consent before study entry and their confidentiality was ensured during data collection by replacing names with alphanumeric codes.
